front.title: LEMONADE Architecture - Supporting OMA Mobile Email (MEM) using Internet Mail

abstract.t: This document specifies the architecture for mobile email, as described by the OMA, using Internet Mail protocols. This architecture is the basis of the work of the LEMONADE WG and is a guidleine for the LEMONADE Profile.Conventions used in this document The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [1].
